law.catch_line: Unless licensed to provide mold remediation services under this subtitle, a person may not represent...
law.text: Unless licensed to provide mold remediation services under this subtitle, a person may not represent to the public by use of the titles "mold remediation license holder", "registered mold remediation contractor", by other title, or by description of services, methods, or procedures, or otherwise, that the person is licensed to provide mold remediation services.
